name: Treason
description: A group of wise guys found a dead body; there are traitors amongst them... Innocent players have to collect clues to find the murderer(s) and kill them!

name: Dragluttony
description: Dear fellow wizard, get ready to enter our frantic 4-player arena party game! With your powerful (but random) spells and potions, feed your little cute Draglutton to make it so big it devours all your friends in a colorful and quirky chaos (without any dragon body shaming here)!

name: Captain Jackson
description: Dynamic 2D retro, pixel-art, shooter. Fly fast, shoot accurately. Fight back the Rivanirs invasion. You are the Captain Jackson, you are their Doom.

name: Arms Trade Tycoon: Tanks
description: Arms Trade Tycoon: Tanks is a unique combination of tank design and tycoon game. It puts you in charge of an arms trading company specialized in tanks from WWI to the modern era. Research, design, sell and follow your tanks in battle to make your own history!

name: Monster Tamer
description: Catch, raise, and fight monsters in a fantasy world! Fuse monsters with simple drag and drop to evolve them into powerful monsters in no time! Raise your own unique monsters to your liking, and fight and capture the toughest enemies that stand in your way! Will you be the best monster tamer?

name: Stretchy-Man: The Video Game
description: Stretchy-Man is a physics based puzzle game. Earths mightiest super hero Super-Duper-Man has been captured by the villain Evil-Man, leaving it up to the unlikely hero Stretchy-Man to save the world from destruction. Will you be able to stop Evil-Man before its too late?

name: Dark Colors
description: Dark Colors is a psychological horror adventure set within an abandoned research facility. You follow your character as you find out what exactly happened here years prior, tasked with gathering information, you start to suspect that you may not be alone in this facility...

name: Kitsune Battlemage
description: Kitsune Battlemage is an intense elemental magic combat game where you're not limited to any specific school or style. Choose your abilities, wage battle against your fellow battlemages, and train your skills in order to fight the growing darkness that approaches!

name: Hydrofoil Generation
description: Hydrofoil Generation is a realistic sailing and foiling simulator. The game focuses on "in-shore" regatta style with heavy emphasis on realism and multiplayer with a first person perspective.

name: Sudden Darkness
description: Sudden Darkness is a top-down horror game where you have to find all the first aid kits as a guy on a wheelchair. When you collect them, the door will open to the next floor. Be vigilant, ghosts and monsters inhabit all floors, do not let them catch you.

name: Undead Pixel Monks
description: Fight dangerous and terrifying enemies, explore a dreamlike world, interact with its strange inhabitants, and uncover the truth. Undead Pixel Monks Adventure is a 2D action-adventure game set in a fantasy world inspired by Japanese mythology and philosophy.

name: Cult of Mine
description: Do you want to become the leader of a cult? Do you want to cause nightmares, take control of others' dreams and contact the dead? Welcome to "Cult of Mine" that unites occultism, rabbits, and satire!

name: En Route: Space
description: En Route: Space is a 2 player co-op puzzle game where you need each other to figure your way out through the mysteries of space. Work together, open your mind and trust one another to persevere this adventure.

name: Heatris
description: For those who want to play a puzzle with time where it will require patience, you can choose the image and the level of difficulty.

name: Magna Graecia
description: Magna Graecia is a colorful building strategy and puzzle game in ancient Greek style in which you create a sprawling village with olives and grapes by placing buildings strategically, leveling them up, receiving adjacency bonuses, and expanding your territory, while enjoying the whole process.

name: Blade and Ham
description: Blade and Ham is a classic fantasy beat'em up with modern picture! Grab your sword sharpen blade and don't forget a ham.

name: Rojo: A Spanish Horror Experience
description:
Explore the apartment of a nostalgic Francoist to find your friend in this short first person horror experience set in Spain.

The game takes place in an oppressive and unique atmosphere, full of references to the traditional Spanish culture. In this experience, the players must explore the creepy apartment to find clues and solve puzzles that help them find the protagonist's missing friend. With only a flashlight and their ingenuity, the players must enter the darkness and overcome their fears to reach the end.

name: Alpha Zoo
description: A cozy typing game for parents to play with their young children. Build a zoo, ride the rides, eat and shop, explore and play together!

name: The Legends of Tynedale
description: The Legends of Tynedale is a classic top-down action adventure game. Journey with Geordie as he takes on his Grandfather’s legacy: to find out if there is truth in the old Legends.

name: The 8 Sins: New Hell Order
description: Turn-based horror strategy game with RPG elements where the action takes place in hell, player take lead one of 8 demonic races that each of them represents one of 7 Deadly Sins (the 8th sin is Acedia).

name: Dunjungle
description: A 2d action-packed roguelike about an ape protecting the jungle from the rise of a corruptive power. Explore ever-changing dungeons, fight weird enemies and gear up with lots of weapons and relics you can combine for a new experience every run. Explore, fight, die, and repeat!

name: Catoise
description: Make portals and levitate objects to solve puzzles - help Catoise get back home after a shopping trip in space ends in a crash landing. Collect parts of the damaged ship scattered across this strange planet. Meet friendly and unfriendly animal characters along the way.

name: Unmetaverse
description: Have you ever tried VRSNS but quit because you couldn't get used to the community? Unmetaverse is a VRSNS for people who have no friends. No voice chat, open world MMO space with content that you can enjoy alone.

name: Finding Home
description: A zombie shooter where you can build your base and craft items to help you survive.

name: Cute Chess
description: Cute Chess is all the fun of regular chess but with cute little characters, scene designs and music to make the game even more fun. Improve your chess skills by practising against computers with a range of different difficulties or take your skills online and compete against others.

name: Cute Dogs
description: Is it possible to buy some happiness with money? Who knows, but you can buy yourself a dog! Look, how cute they are! Play with our fluffy little fellas, a «find-differences» game. These cute little puppies can help you relax and find some peace of mind.

name: The Pied Piper of Gamelin
description: Casual third person game. In fact, this is a remake of "Snake", but thanks to the 3D graphics it has a peculiar gameplay. The camera position can be easily adjusted at will. Character control is very simple, you can also use a gamepad.

name: Roady Life
description: Experience the life of a trucker, delivering cargo between various industries. Feed the most valuable production lines or fulfill contracts to earn enough money to own the largest fleet of trucks among your friends, or start your own industries to maximize your profits.

name: Darwin's Aquarium
description: Breeding and training intelligent fishes is your hobby. Discover new species and defeat the bossfish - make your fish become real animals - wiht a real brain... brwwww. Learn AI the easy way - like playing.

name: Motorbike Traffic Splash
description: Motorbike Traffic Splash is an arcade scoring race.

name: Mythic Legions Tactics
description: Discover the world of Mythoss and build your "Mythic Legion" in this innovative, customizable, non-Pay-to-win tactics game featuring Fully 3D Realistic Environments, Hundreds of Class options, and Skill Based Battles! Build your Legion! Change your faction! Fight in the war of the aetherblade!

name: Repit
description: Madness is the repetition of the same action over and over again, in the hope of a change. The challenge that Repit throws at your nerves is not everyone is ready to accept and only a few will be able to reach the end

name: One by One
description: Human phobias have awoken in this dark roguelike shooter One by One! Collect powerful artifacts and descend into random dungeons full of monsters and huge boss fights. Use your soul — an ultimate weapon that uncovers enemy weaknesses.

name: Hailing from the Abyss
description: Hailing From the Abyss is a rhythm game with a unique duel setup. Beat powerful enemies in rhythmic battles by using consumables, acquiring power-ups, and skill. Guide Suri while she faces her past memories in style and rhythm!

name: Wild Dogs
description: The world is under a frantic alien attack. Amidst the chaos and with the army virtually subdued, the deadliest and most inconsequential pair of specialists are called upon to do what must be done. Join the war hunting aliens around the world and in every way possible.

name: Crate Mates
description: The pinnacle of warehouse worker simulators. Crate Mates is a block pushing puzzle game with a unique twist: Gravity.

name: Warden of the Arcaen
description: Warden of the Arcaen is a dating sim style visual novel. The player will get to choose between dating men or women at the beginning of the game, play as 'Friends to Lovers' OR 'Enemies to Lovers'. Immerse yourself in this modern fantasy world and explore magical relationships!

name: Evasilix
description: Evasilix is a 2.5D die and retry platformer combined with a unique movement mechanic. Challenge yourself in more than 25 hand-crafted levels, each filled with deadly traps, countless obstacles, strong enemies, and reveal the disturbing truth that lies behind Evasilix!

name: Return to Kurgansk
description: Return to Kurgansk is an virtual reality adventure game, where you need to survive in an area full of danger and mystery.

name: Prison Life Simulator: The Legend of Navalny
description: Immerse yourself in the prison life of the most dangerous criminal in modern Russia.Go through the prison path from the beginning and determine the fate of the famous defendant. What will you become? Offended, authority or maybe the president of the Russian Federation? Everything depends on you!

name: Roma Invicta
description: Roma Invicta combines action packed real-time battles with turn-based strategy on a big campaign map. Supply your legions and conquer ancient Gaul turn by turn. Fight by yourself or hand over your soldiers to the AI ​​and enjoy the spectacle.

name: BeetleQuest 2
description: BeetleQuest 2 is a point & click adventure game about three beetlefriends who go on their second adventure to help the bumblebee postman. His letters and packages have come alive through a magic spell. The spell has gone wrong however, and all the letters and packages have run away.

name: Dumb Bomb Game
description: Bing bang boom, explode your guy across the room! Use bombs to guide your guy to the portal at the end of each level. Avoid the danger that sits between you and a high score!

name: Dangerous Drift
description: Dangerous Drift is an arcade racing game, in which we must manage to beat our rivals by driving in different locations around the world. Will you be able to win all the challenges?

name: Deep Cave
description: Deep Cave is a roguelike game about the adventures of a brave dwarf in search of great riches.

name: Nano Racing
description: Race around a number of tracks in miniature cars all with ultra realistic next gen graphics. Choose between a number of cars, each with its own driving style. Participate in single player events or race against others online

name: The Unlikely Prometheus
description: A classic 2D Point and Click adventure game

name: Lunar Odyssey
description: Lunar Odyssey is an immersive first-person VR experience, depicting details of the Apollo Missions, Lunar Lander, lunar surface, and Apollo-era technology with impressive accuracy and levels of interaction.

name: Wekufu
description: A Dark, Hand Drawn 2D Hack and Slash Platformer. Play as Sakinko, a young warrior set on a quest to avenge her father’s death and protect her people from the evil spirits that now menace her land, these evil spirits take the name of Wekufu.

name: Fall of an Empire
description: Defend your realm from invaders in Fall of an Empire. Barbarians attack your frontiers and treacherous vassals plot against you. You know your crumbling empire won't last forever, but it's up to you to see how long you can save it.

name: Elusive World
description: Survive against wild animals, common bandits, and overpowering rulers. Collect ingredients to craft from simple arrows for your bow to complex Ice Sword. Rich coming-of-age adventure. Single-player, story-driven RPG.

name: Tape To Tape
description: Tape to Tape is a unique roguelite hockey game where every choice matters on your journey to build the ultimate hockey team. Choose your path, hire unique players, discover synergies between them, find new abilities, bribe the referees or visit the blademaster while you progress toward the major leagues.

name: Kehra
description: Kehra is a future based little puzzel game, with different voicelines and music...

name: Workshop Simulator
description: Workshop Simulator allows you to repair and refurbish items using a range of restoration mechanics such as disassembling, cleaning, sanding and painting. The accompanying story will immerse you in the nostalgia of tinkering with your grandfather.

name: Pusheep
description: Pusheep is a very simple yet challenging puzzle game about planning your moves to achieve one clear goal, removing all evil sheep from your beautiful floating islands.

name: Pump King
description: Wield the incredible power of the shot-leg to blast your way out of an unforgiving and seemingly endless chasm. Or screw up and send yourself tumbling back down to the bottom - it’s up to you.

name: Captain Diarrhea and the Shartening
description: A top-down action shooter/sprayer. Use gross and weird movement mechanics and abilities. Enact revenge on the black military division that abducted you and made you the way that you are. BRING FORTH THE SHARTENING.

name: Dungeon Runner XZ
description: Dungeon Runner is based in a Hub city and from there you will choose your quests and dungeon runs. There will be a lot of Game mechanics when the game is released.Quest SystemParty System Class change systemAnd much More!

name: The Vellescian Gambit
description: Play the role of a merchant's apprentice in this 1600s-inspired realistic setting full with trading companies and business ploys. A short (2-3h) but replayable visual novel/RPG with logistics and trading aspects, brought to life with beautiful baroque paintings and classical music.

name: Sludge Fighters
description: Fight from the floor, wall, or ceiling! In Sludge Fighters, gravity follows you. Turn into a ball of sludge to launch onto a new surface or sneak under arena obstacles! Run, punch, and kick to knock out other players. In this online multiplayer arena, join your friends or host a public game.

name: Jigsaw Souls
description: A fun puzzle about Daltoniel, the protagonist from the Souls Saga by Pickles Entertainment. Relax resolving this jigsaw puzzle with 12 original pictures and 3 difficulty levels!

name: Runeforge
description: Design your own spells, weapons, armor and tools. Discover procedurally generated mobs, resources, and regions. Build anything, anywhere. Team up with friends & play together in the ultimate sandbox RPG!

name: Lendas
description: Lendas is an action RPG with focus on exploration and survival in a living ecosystem procedurally generated. You will harvest resources, defeat powerfull creatures and borrow their powers to defeat the Corpo-seco and the mighty Cuca.

name: Blood Red Fists
description: Explore a vast and crime ridden city, fight your enemies in first person mode, talk to random strangers, steal and sell various items, gamble with your money, gain experience and spend it on helpful skills. But above all, try to stay alive in this 2d retro beat 'em up.

name: Exquisite Ghorpse Story
description: Sit around the campfire with your friends and assemble a spooky ghost story. Was it an eldritch cult or the living dead causing trouble for the local townsfolk? Did the terror happen in a derelict gas station, or perhaps it was an abandoned carnival? And how did they meet their fate?

name: The Medieval Psychologist
description: You are a stranger in Lostworth, full of people lost in the darkness of the Middle Ages. Your purpose; helping people spiritually. For this, you only have books, potions, spells and your words. In this adventure, you will face the truth about yourself as you uncover the secrets of the city.

name: SpaceCraft Brawl
description: A top-down, multiplayer, physics driven, space shooter game with destructible ship parts. Build your own spacecrafts. Fight with and against other players in different game modes, using a variety of weapons. Pick up super weapons and slice enemy ships in half. Easy to get into, hard to master.

name: Carnage Cross
description: Start your engines in the vehicular combat game Carnage Cross, with seven playable drivers, nine levels, and an arsenal of weapons, specials and rogue-like abilities at your disposal in story or skirmish modes, your hi-octane skills will uncover secrets of the mysterious and destructive contest.

name: Knight Jones and Dragons Fall
description: Protect innocent people from evil dragons as the most noble and humble of all knights. Uncover the treacherous deception and save the Kingdom (optionally you can marry the prince/princess afterwards).

name: A Contusion
description: A Contusion is a slow-paced slightly realistic roguelite top-down shooter where you find yourself lost and with impaired memory. Weapons and armor, shields, grenades and first aid kits, powerful artifacts and perks will help you on a difficult road to the past.

name: Boomerang Woman
description: This is an orthodox horizontal scrolling 2D action game 'Platformer'. A player will control 'Kyoko Senbonbashi', who always stands on the side of justice, to defeat an evil organization 'Dokuro-dan' by using a boomerang thrown to 8 directions and passing all 8 stages.

name: Cartels
description: Cartels is a tactical hardcore multiplayer first person shooter taking place in 1980s Colombia. Experience a variety of intense objective focused versus and cooperative game modes where a single bullet is often enough to win the fight.

name: Everglow
description: Experience story of Glow, young and naive furry heroine caught between two empires interplanetary ambitions forged in tragedy and conspiracy.

name: Battle Bees Royale
description: ~ BATTLE ROYALE WITH A FUN BEE POWERED TWIST ~Fight for survival in a top down, last blimp standing multiplayer Battle Royale!

name: Unfair Souls: Darkest Grind
description: A 2D Souls-Like Pixel Art Platformer.

name: Academy of Magic: The Great Dark Wizard's Curse
description: In the third part of the magical match3 serial, your goal is to help Dennis to break the curse and save the "Academy of Magic" from a dark sorcerer.

name: 10 Seconds to Win!
description: 10 seconds to win! is a platform game where you only have 10 seconds to complete each stage, be agile and skillful to complete all levels.

name: Mystery Chamber 2015 Forever
description: The final and expanded edition of Mystery Chamber 2015, which includes various improvements, gameplay changes, and new content.

name: Three Defilements
description: Three Defilements is a hack and slash adventure game about a young woman who keeps waking up in the same place every day. She travels to find a way out of this cycle, passing through various strange places. and must battle her most vexing foe, her own defilements.

name: Break Robots VR
description: "Break Robots VR" is an action game with somatosensory operation. You will play as an robot fighter to slash through the battlefield.

name: Salvation: Shadows of the Faceless
description: A first-person dark horror game essentially tells about mental suffering, overcoming fears, and the power of true love.

name: Day After Day
description: Day After Day is a resource management/survival game set in a zombie outbreak. Keep your characters alive, set out on scavenge runs and maybe find a safe haven.

name: Undead Menace
description: Undead Menace - A brave girl went in search of treasures in ancient caves, despite the legend of the immortal guardians of jewels. She is sure that her passion for treasures cannot be stopped by neither skeletal magicians, nor dangerous chasms and traps!

name: Fallen Flowers
description: Strange atmosphere, strange things, but the performance is so "familiar". How "strange" does the familiar room and familiar her look? Why does everything start? Where will it go?

name: Sigh of the Abyss: Shadow Bonds
description: Embrace the monster within to free yourself from a curse in this dark fantasy visual novel, an introduction to the characters and setting of Sigh of the Abyss.

name: Isaiah 188
description: Fight on the ground and in space around 17 different bodies in our solar system with unique lite orbital mechanics. Recruit armies, build fleets, and conquer the solar system as one of three unique factions in this turn based strategy game!

name: Take As Needed
description: Assume a lead drug development role at Mazer- the foremost pharmaceutical company in the world! Create groundbreaking drugs for your customers, work hard to impress your bosses, and try not to ruffle too many feathers...

name: Project Runner
description: Project Runner is a Survival Game where the protagonist is trapped in a maze with the main objective is to scape the maze.

name: Grand Hike
description: Go on a unique and unforgettable Hike and discover the old historical forest and it's secrets. Get ready for an calm and relaxing adventure far away from the civilization. What kinds of encounters will your Hike have?

name: Exodus: Trapped In Time
description: A retro 2.5D sci-fi FPS shooter with modern mechanics with custom engine. Features completely destructible environments, bullet-time slow motion, Newtonian physics, dynamic lighting and more fun features.

name: Lupa
description: A beautiful stylized polygon 3rd-person exploration game, with a semi-open world and a beautiful She-Wolf, called Lupa who is looking for her missing pack and her two little cubs. With a story inspired by Roman mythology. Join Lupa in this beautiful world and her journey!

name: Tormentis
description:
Prepare your dungeon against intruders and protect your loot chests with monsters and well-placed traps. Train your hero, equip powerful gear and conquer other players' dungeons to fight your way to the top of the league.

Where classic action role-playing meets dungeon building. Your task is to protect your loot boxes from intruders. They supply you with coins and your opponents want to empty them!

Create a unique dungeon that will mislead your opponents. Place monsters and traps in your dungeon and lead your opponents into an ambush. They may not reach your treasury in time!

With every victory over another player you will receive trophies and rise in the rankings.

name: Heroes of Agora
description: Multiplayer online PvP combat arena third person fighting game featuring both ranged and melee style combat with a large roster of playable characters each with unique attacks. Destroy your opponent or die trying.

name: Blood Nova
description: Princess Love is set to assume the throne of a powerful galactic empire. But when conspirators try to thwart her ascension, Love and her best friend Kel become stranded on an interstellar lighthouse. Prove Love worthy of rule in this thrilling point and click adventure game.

name: Progeria: Vae Victis
description: XXI century, Russian Empire. Kirill Yeletsky is a fifth-year student at the Saint Petersburg Academic University of Necromagic. Help him defend the honor of his noble family by winning in the grand imperial necromagic tournament.

name: Danglebox
description: Danglebox is about creating physics based structures to hunt for resources or just for fun. Build with various materials, lift with balloons, pull with ropes and push with thrusters to enable your designs to withstand the weight of trains, buildings, containers, weapons fire and more.

name: Space Balls
description: Shoot yourself into space as high as you can in this arcade game with a retro soundtrack!

name: Cubes of Death
description: Cubes of Death is a 3D-puzzle game, with both story mode (single player) and arcade mode (to play time-trials against a friend). If this first release is somewhat successful, PvP and Co-op story mode will be next on our to-do-list.

name: Nitrojet
description: Nitrojet is a metroidvania where everything is destructible. Explore and survive this ruined world filled with deadly beasts with the help of your jetpack and blade.

name: Inari's Tale
description: A 2D action-puzzle-platformer mixing traditional animation, strong story-telling, and evolutive gameplay.

name: Evil Dreams
description: Evil Dreams is a dark adventure about nightmares, telling the story of a boy living in the late 19th century and forced to face ancient evil. Delve into the world of dreams to find out the truth.

name: True Magician
description: How do you become a true magician? Find out in True Magician, an interactive text adventure with RPG elements. Travel through the kingdom with your teacher, learn the art of magic, fight enemies and make friends. And remember, the world is not what it seems!

name: Unread Unwound
description: There’s one goal: SAVE THE WORLD. Unread Unwound is a warm RPG where a strange power connects you to a mysterious guide. Battle enemies, explore a colorful journey, and perhaps appease your inner demons.

name: Hordebreaker
description: An army of monsters, demons, and undead sweeps the land. Armed with only an old sword, crossbow, and A LOT of fireworks, waves of unique and dangerous enemies advance on you. Upgrade your equipment, and push back. Take the fight to them, destroy their leaders, and break the horde.

name: Dash Cup Kickers
description: Super fast paced arcade action soccer with incredible power dashes, sweet mega tricks and unbelieveable powerful super shots! Master all tricks, skill up your team, develop the best technique and earn gold in all cups! Play online or locally with up to 4 players in varying stadiums

name: Bouncy Cube
description: Bouncy Cube is an arcade game where you keep the balance of a cube on moving platforms.

name: High Elo Girls
description: High Elo Girls is a Visual Novel set in the esports scene where you play as the latest recruit for a new all-girls team. Can you help your squad achieve their true potential, or will you only squander your own?

name: Love Notes
description: Play as Rachel or Jesse in this horror dating sim featuring 2 male and 3 female love interests.

name: Microbrewery Tycoon
description: An economic strategy dedicated to microbrewery management. Your craft beer should become famous all over the world!

name: Best Forklift Operator
description: Best Forklift Operator is a super-realistic, physics-based forklift vehicle simulator. Experience what the job of a forklift operator looks like, participate in the training and show that you are ready for the challenges.

name: Monastery Builder
description: Become a monk in a medieval European monastery. Be diligent with your duties, and develop and expand your friary. Learn plenty of useful skills and contribute to raising the standard of living for the local community.

name: Sokoramp
description: Sokoramp is a relaxing puzzle game with various mechanics in over 50 levels.

name: X Fugitive
description: X Fugitive is a police chase game where player have to run from the police cars . This is an endless game in which you just have to survive as long as possible.

name: Yavi
description: A retro styled 2D Sci-Fi RPG including robot fighting, hilarious dialogues and a great story that will make you laugh and cry - if you're a sensitive person (which is nothing to be ashamed of!).

name: Mini Army Tactics Medieval
description: Casual turn-based strategy game set in a fantasy Medieval era. Strategically command your troops on the battlefield to crush your opponent in combat. Use your troops abilities carefully to turn the tide of battle in your favor. Do you have what it takes to win the war?

name: Palmi: Retold Tale
description: Defeat evil sorcerer and save the world in this platform adventure game. Discover seven different hand-painted lands and follow the story full of amazing events and meets.

name: Pangaroids
description: Destroy the deadly bouncing orbs for the highest score in this Pang meets Asteroids arcade blaster.

name: Karl's Kooky Warehouse
description: A madcap, arcade-style, platforming challenge! Can you best the evils of the warehouse and defeat the C.E.O.?

name: Lirica
description: The world of Opera is fading away! To bring the spirit of music back to life and help restore Lirica to its former glory, join Renatta and new musical friends as they explore the world, solve music puzzles, and restore life to Lirica.

name: Zombie Maze
description: If you love top-down shooters and mazes of which it is incredibly difficult to find a way out, then Zombie Maze will be a real godsend for you! Go through the most difficult maze from start to finish, along the way, shooting back from the bloodthirsty hordes of zombies! Don't let them get in the way

name: Shrumblo and the Magical Grumblo
description: Survive for as long as you can while playing as the blue robot Shrumblo! The objective of this game is to lure Grumblo, the red demon, into several moving spikes which temporarily stuns him, and also earns you a point. Survive for as long as you can and earn a high score!

name: Dreamy Planet
description: A gloomy yuri VN set in an abandoned theme park, focused on a ruinous relationship between a pair of estranged childhood friends.

name: Reefland
description: Reefland - is a colorful city-building simulator with a relaxing atmosphere, where you are up to paint the island by placing buildings.

name: There is No Stairs
description: Thousands of rocket jump accidents are reported worldwide every year. Unfortunately, a bald inventor here also lost legs trying to get up to the second floor. But he wasn't frustrated. Now he is designing an unprecedented new invention, dreaming of a world without rocket jumps... It's the stairs.

name: Atomic Souls
description: Atomic Souls is a tactical roguelite deckbuilder which has you playing as an awoken remnant of the old world. Journey through the new world, encounter bizarre creatures, assemble the perfect deck, discover powerful artifacts, and fulfill your destiny!

name: Cursed Quest
description: An action adventure game where you will explore, fight, solve puzzles, improve your abilities and find equipment to make your way to the "source".

name: Software Company
description: Build your own videogame-studio from the early days of videogaming to the future of the industry. Develop the games of your dreams, take care of your employees and mange your business.

name: The Dormant Knight
description: Fight your way through hordes of skeletons and spirits, in The Dormant Knight! A 2D Halloween Hack and Slash, Adventure. Explore the mysterious land of Dreadborough, a once lavish land now tainted by evil spirits due to the Dormant Knight's re-wakening! Why has the Dormant Knight awoken once more?

name: Mystery of Island
description: Mystery of Island is a wilderness survival game. Various enemies, huge map to explore, collect resources to improve and strengthen yourself over time.

name: Elohim Eternal: The Babel Code
description: Explore a vibrant world where ancient religions fuse with technology in this character-driven JRPG. Master deep turn-based combat as you battle with divine magic against beasts with mecha parts. Embark on a grand adventure to retrieve the sacred Babel code needed to face your Gods.

name: Stolen Crown
description: Stolen Crown is a deck-building game with dynamic combat, diverse encounters, and powerful relics. Three different classes, paired with hundreds of spells and abilities, means each run has something to offer!

name: Arksync
description: Wired from the ashes of twin stick Shooters, Arksync evolves the genre with breakneck player movement and lethal enemy AI. Kill for energy to buy weapons, utilities, and upgrades; risk it all as you enter the depths of the evacuation facility. It's the only way to take this robot teddy bear home.

name: Iron Lung
description: A short horror game where you pilot a tiny submarine through an ocean of blood on an alien moon.

name: Destroy the Cubes 2
description: Destroy the Cubes 2 is a casual puzzle game where you need to find the right trajectory of the balls to destroy all number cubes at once. Various mechanics will challenge your physical intuition and accuracy. Use the level editor to create levels and challenge yourself in your own way.

name: Inner Light
description: Meditation beyond a simple relaxation - actively using the power of VR to bring meditator into deeper levels of relaxation, awareness and focus.

name: The Circle of Suffering
description: This game is a psychological horror in which the main character wakes up in an unfamiliar house and must pass all the levels by solving puzzles.

name: Mizu
description: A casual rollerblading game. From the hills to the city, Mizu is the rollerblading game you've always wanted. Bomb hills, grind handrails, jump unbelievable gaps and explore the city on inline skates! 8 grinds and 4 grabs to choose from!

name: Turbeton
description: Turbeton is a competitive multiplayer game in which two players go head-to-head, waging a strategic fight for control of the Afterlife.

name: Starblast: Retro Wars
description: A simple colorful arcade twin-stick shooter in space.

name: KeyHero
description: KeyHero is a puzzle game. In the game, the key is the only tool for you to pass obstacles.

name: Maybe Immortal
description: Maybe Immortal is an action role-playing hack-and-slash game based on Chinese mythology and cultivation. You will grow in a courtyard of one mysterious taoist to become immortal.

name: Lotto Life
description: A dystopian lottery simulator. Set in a city ruled by a mega-corporation, try to stay afloat in a world with mandatory consumerism quotas. Will the lottery offer reprieve? Will lady luck favor you?

name: Eat Colors
description: Eat Colors is a precision platform game, where instead of running and jumping you throw yourself from surface to surface using just the mouse and a fluffy slime that sticks anywhere.

name: Cu-Blit
description: Cu-Blit is a grid-based sokoban style puzzle game in a Sci-Fi city that's lost its power. Follow the journey of a small worker robot using the last of its battery to control other robots, recharge, teleport and build pathways to the head console and reboot the city back to its original self.

name: Ghoul Dungeon
description: Welcome to Ghoul Dungeon, a level-based adventure. As you make your way, you will encounter monsters you must fight off. You'll only be able to hit them up close, so make sure you stay agile.

name: The Spanish Privateer
description: Escape the confines of high-society and find freedom, romance, and danger on the high seas as a privateer in this pirate otome. A historical fiction visual novel set in the early 17th century, travel from Spain across the Caribbean while surviving life at sea.

name: See You In Desolation?
description: "See You In Desolation?" is a psychological, single-player, first-person horror game. You have to take on the role of Adam - an introverted young man who prefers to be at home all days.

name: Toolnich Village
description: Toolnich Village, a Retro, 2D level-based game similar to an RPG. The game has a story where you "PLAYER" try to save or not the Toolnich location.

name: A Day Out
description: A Day Out is a monster-hunting, paranormal-investigating, and case-solving co-op shooter game. Unlock gadgets and upgrade your base as you discover a new supernatural world with your friends!

name: Kamigami: Clash of the Gods
description: Easy to play, hard to master, join this adventure on an unique card game where you are able to do everything you ever wanted. Collect cards, build your decks, play offline on history mode, challenge your friends online or take on the world in a ranked system!

name: SlipDream Resonator
description: SlipDream Resonator is a multi-directional rhythm game with unique twin-stick controls. Inspired by both classic rhythm games and top-down shooters, SlipDream Resonator offers addictive arcade gameplay designed to challenge while featuring eye catching visuals and a heart pumping soundtrack.

name: Watermelon Wars
description: A game based on a popular Chinese video. A war caused by buying a watermelon.

name: Infinite Progression
description: Never worry about finishing your current idle game, because this one never ends! Play through a procedurally generated incremental. Gather currencies. drive once hard to get currencies to obsolescence, or just mess around. What you do is up to you in this infinite idle.

name: A Frustrating Platformer
description: Test your platforming skills in this challenging 2D platformer game

name: Call For Backup
description: Defend USA in a post-apocalyptic war against ghouls and commies. While some are in control of combat drones, one person becomes the commander. Ground forces rely on the commander's air support, but he can’t see the battlefield. Communication is crucial! Single-player campaign included!

name: Endless Zombie Weekend
description: Endless Zombie Weekend is an endless arcade game with RPG elements. It's hard to be the only survivor after the apocalypse. How often do you think about it? As the main character of the game, you can feel it! Upgrade your weapons and try to survive as many days as possible.

name: Umbra Galaxy
description: Umbra Galaxy is a sci-fi shoot'em'up where you pilot a spaceship adrift in the restricted space filled with enemies. Destroy enemy generators, fight your way to the bosses and secure the obscure goal in the end!

name: Space Roguelike Adventure
description:
It's time for an incredible adventure in pixel art roguelike platformer game - Space Roguelike Adventure! Be the hero! Save the universe!

Now, there’s another far far galaxy from a parallel universe — and suddenly the Rainbow planet appeared there for no particular reason. It had such a strong magnetic field that it practically smashed the protective barrier of the prison planet Abakaz. Many dangerous galactic criminals have managed to escape and settled in some uninhabited lands. All these unfortunate events bring us to the point where the adventures of a young hunter from planet Earth will start. It’s you, of course!

name: Fragmented Memories
description: Immerse yourself in the Psychological horror adventure of James Charouz on his way to find his missing wife and uncover the dark secret of his hometown.

name: Bear Adventures 2
description: Bear Adventures is a 3D platformer with exciting levels in different locations and unique graphics! You can play alone, as well as invite your friends, because Bear Adventures is co-op game mode supports up to 4 players!

name: Wingsuit Dream
description: One day, you have dreamt about fly the sky in there you feel free to fly A simple game about scoring, avoid and fly!

name: My Last Journey
description: We all fall once...And now that day has come,when we were down,too.You have to go on an unforgettable adventure,which change you forever.Your fate depends on your decisions, will be you able to survive,or this journey will be your last...

name: Here to Stay
description: Join the race for power in the new political strategy game. Build a strong political party, win the regional elections and have a majority in parliament. As the head of state, you are in charge of running the state, managing the state budget and diplomacy.

name: Handyman Corporation
description: In Handyman Corporation you become the owner of a business where you handle a variety of jobs in cleaning, maintenance, design, and construction. Accept contracts, play minigames to perform every task required. Then expand your company – buy spare parts, tools, train skills, and manage.

name: Clocknockers
description: Bad Dudes have broken Time Itself, You must travel to multiple Times and Locations to fix time.

name: Axial Drift
description: Axial Drift is an online-multiplayer FPS-Z modding platform where you can create your own maps, skins, weapons, and game modes using Unreal Engine 4.

name: Star Shift Rebellion
description: Infernis Prime is a mining colony in the Outer Rim, under brutal occupation. With the help of a hacked android, and the discovery of a dark secret below the surface, the rebels see their chance to finally break free from their oppressors.

name: Solitaire Harmony
description: Minimalist solitaire peg puzzles, find your way out to the last dragon in this relaxing and beautiful game.

name: Repella Fella
description: Set in a future, post-apocalyptic Australia, Repella Fella tells the story of several characters as they work to change their position in the world. Shoot, stab, lie or maim your way through each problem as it presents itself.

name: SGS Operation Hawaii
description: On December 7th, 1941, the Empire of Japan struck a surprise blow against unsuspecting American forces at Pearl Harbor, Hawaï. In the ensuing confusion and panic, the USA feared a Japanese invasion of Oahu island, but it fortunately did not materialize. But what would have happened if it had?

name: Marble Computing
description: Using only marbles and gravity, solve logic problems in surprising ways!

name: Alephant
description: Alephant is an abstract sokoban-like puzzle game about rules and languages. Solve tutorial-less puzzles and help Alephant find a way to communicate.

name: Cyber Lounge Tycoon
description: Cyber Lounge Tycoon is a sandbox management game where you get to build and customize your own gaming club. Serve each customer or get a staff to do that for you. Upgrade and maintain your existing services. Unlock new options. Decide what kind of club you want to run!

name: The Holy Chalice
description: The Holy Chalice is a fast-paced top down roguelike based in a fantasy world. You are a goblin shaman whose village has just been attacked and the villages holy chalice has been stolen by the evil entity. Fight different bosses and explore a fantasy world in this shooter roguelike.

name: Bobalicous
description: A Juicy Treasure Hunting Game. Search for the Gem Chest. Search for the Key. Unlock the Gem Chest with the Key. Bring the Gem back to the Gem site.

name: Grappling Hook Ball Tournament
description: Grappling Hook Ball Tournament is a shooting game, players against players. Play with friends, up to 8 players. Welcome to the arena!

name: My Otaku Academia
description: A Fan made game of 9 Anitube all stars and a mystery girl. Play as Nux Taku as his first day in a new school begins! Make friends, enemies, and fall in love!

name: Herency
description: Herency is a cooperative survival game for 1-4 players. Grandma died and something happened at the family meal, run away from the killer and find a way to escape and take the inheritance with you.

name: Keep Light
description: Bruno is looking for those who left him. He wants know the reason. Will he bring the Light to them or no?

name: Fortune & Famine
description: In this tabletop strategy game you play as the ruler of a fantasy kingdom on the brink of a long winter. You compete against neighboring rulers to gather the best workers and stockpile the most resources in the land.

name: They Came From Below
description: They Came From Below is a cute Tower Defense in Lowpoly 3D graphics. Here you have to build an economy and various defense towers to resist hordes of skeletons.

name: Blocks Must Fall!
description: Find a way to take off all the bright tiles in this relaxing puzzle game.

name: Russian Drunken Boxers 2
description: New fights of drunken Russian boxers at night. Spoof your friend or Ai bot using empty bottles of alcohol. Use super abilities

name: Being Ball
description: Traverse your way as a round ball through a beautiful dangerous cube world with traps, obstacles and challenging puzzles.

name: Witch Slide
description: Witch Slide is a free to play, co-operative (1-4 players), sliding and dodging game where you leave your village with great haste to find what has corrupted the nearby forest. Together with your friends you must find your way through puzzles and escape danger.

name: Super Liquid Soccer
description: Super Liquid Soccer is a fun arcade style 7 aside soccer/real football game coming soon for PC and Mac. A game for those less worried about simulating every blade of grass and more about epic battles amongst friends, last minute winners, cynical fouls, bullet headers and questionable tactics.

name: Kubberz
description: Kubberz is an Action RPG where you can take part on epic battles against your friends and other players around the world, as well as collect and train more then 100 different species of Kubberz.

name: Tarot: Theo's Quest
description: Embark on a quest of self discovery in this card-based adventure RPG! Complete your Tarot deck, read people's future with taromancy, and use your powers over the elements to solve environmental puzzles. Summon your spirit and duel other witches in turn-based combat. Will you discover yourself?

name: City Night Carnage
description: City Night Carnage is a first-person survival horror in the setting of a night city. Find weapons and ammunition, first-aid kits and records that reveals what is happening here. But most important is to find a key somewhere nearby that will help you avoid a deadly encounter with HIM!

name: Calamity Eliminator
description: Calamity Eliminator is an anime-styled roguelike single-player deck-building game.You play as a member of the Existence Management Company, using the Calamity Eliminator to lead pioneers and Valkyries to save the day on a planet that has been struck by disaster.

name: Possession Obsession
description: Possession Obsession is a 2-4 player local multiplayer party game. As interns, you and your friends will compete for a coveted position at the infamous HELLC. Utilize your demonic powers and possess mortals to complete the boss's tasks in any way possible.

name: Bad Credit
description: Let's take it back to 2016. Donald Trump just went on Jimmy Fallon. The new Ghostbusters is still in theatres. You're working as a two-bit financier in the morally and financially bankrupt city of Tucson, Arizona. Take your own path amongst 100+ dynamic characters in this neo-western visual novel.

name: Dream Kitchen
description: Follow the story from different points of view and make choices to decide your future on five different routes and discover the mystery behind this magical adventure as you find love with one of the appliances of your kitchen.

name: Demon Spore
description: Blast your way out of tentacle hell as a failed lab experiment gives birth to a rapidly growing viral horror in this intense action rogue-lite inspired by 80s Monster movies. Use the lab to your advantage and improvise an escape plan before this constantly evolving life form spreads out of control.

name: Zombie Crush VR
description: Woke up on the street alone in the middle of Zombie apocalypse and faced an awful decaying undead hunting you down straight away - What could be more fun? Only start crashing them into pieces with no mercy with different kinds of tools to save your life. Grab your weapon and let’s Crush Zombie VR!

name: Color Flash
description: Color Flash is an endless runner 2d game based on colors. The player has to pass through a series of obstable bars (divided into four tiles) by matching the tile with the same color as the player.

name: Pop's
description: Save the toys!

name: Bullet Casters
description: Bullet Casters in an unconventional Shoot ‘em Up game with a local PvP mode where you can challenge your friends and create your own bullet hell or face a single-player mode that will test your skill and wits.

name: Knightlife
description: Four villages in a war. You are the only hope for a peaceful life. Play as a knight in this cute open world RPG and loot through many different weapons, magical spells and bows. Become the strongest knight and end this war.

name: Vampire Combat
description: Test your skills in the Art of VAMPIRE COMBAT. Become one of 6 dynamic, elegant, Vampires of Fullerton: Ashzel, Casandra, Larson, Johfra, Colmillo, and LeonaLisa. Rendezvous with a worthy Vampire opponent acclimated in all disciplines. Showcase your VAMPIRE COMBAT skills.

name: Crazi Lift
description: Crazi Lift is a simulator / arcade with a forklift. Manage your warehouse and earn up to get the MANAGER qualification !! But be careful ... Time goes by ... and the mouse explode !!

name: Valley of Dragons
description: In Valley of Dragons, be prepared to raise and care for your own personal dragon!

name: Spooky Horror Game
description: A psychedelic horror shooter. A prison, four monsters, and you. Collect items and keys to survive. Don't let them find you.

name: Far Away From Home
description: Far Away From Home is a story-driven tactical RPG. Battle foes in turn-based combat, turn monstrous enemies into friends, customize your party with a variety of builds, and craft powerful gear to enhance your playstyle. Unfold the mystery of your lost party as you try to find a way home.

name: Ethos 2: Fall of Empires
description: Constantinople has fallen to the Ottomans. As the last Emperor or the Byzantines, it is your job to take it back. Explore the open world, and carve your own path to overthrow the Ottoman's. Every choice you make matters. Become a Tyrant, a Hero, a Lone Wolf, or much more! The choice is yours!

name: Wasteland Warden
description: You take it upon yourself to clean up the wasteland by imprisoning all sorts of robots and cyborgs in this near future dystopia. Build and level a team of prisoners in this party-based RPG with tactical combat as you face off against crime lords, artificial intelligence and an all consuming sludge.

name: Human vs Food
description: Human vs Food is a challenging action platformer game set in a world where food has taken over the world. In battle, you will have to destroy food a lot and skillfully. Explore 100 levels, play as 6 different characters with different skills. Save the world!

name: Mega Zombie Explosion
description: Mega Zombie Explosion is Zombie killing game where you need to survive the Zombie Waves there is lot of Zombies to kill and you need talent to do it. But there is a help many different weapons to kill the zombies and Cool Background Rock Music.

name: Encore Illusions
description: Experience thrills, chills and spills in a war of wills. Blaze a winning trail through a magical game of hidden object adventure. The road to truth and justice isn't easy. Unlock card games as you progress through a maze of obstacles filled with hidden objects and puzzle challenges.

name: Monster Girl Manager
description: Summon, consult, and train procedurally generated monster girls in this dungeon roguelite. Evaluate the strengths and weaknesses of different monster types as you prepare the ultimate team to defeat dangerous enemies and collect powerful artifacts.

name: Temporal Sprint
description: Temporal Sprint is a 3D platformer game focused on Speedrunning and Time manipulation (such as slow motion and rewinding.)

name: To Carry a Sword
description: Story-rich roleplaying game mixing interactive events, strategic planning, and real-time combat. Become the guard of a medieval caravan in a journey where the social connections you make are just as important as the money.

name: Dreamlands: Cotton Candy Hunt
description: Avoid Spikes and cannons, run fast, jump precisely and collect enough candies to see all levels of Dreamlands. Once you have mastered the basics new challenges are waiting for you.

name: The Missing Link
description: The Missing Link is a pixel art-style RPG game with turn-based strategy. Available in portuguese and english. The game features: 90 collectable cards for the mini-game, +400 spells, legendary weapons and demonic relics forging system, resource collection system, 9 playable characters.

name: Grim Road
description: Grim Road is a roguelike with turn-based combat set in a hopeless dark world. The Sun has disappeared, and heroes have to travel through dying lands to slay Archdemons and get a chance for humanity to survive. It's Gothic, it's Black&White, and has a lot of dithering.

name: Fallen Guns
description: Stand still and shoot in slow motion, walk and time returns to normal. Perfect shots and correct timings are what you're looking for in Fallen Guns.

name: Super Clown: Lost Diamonds
description: Super Clown is Back! Fight against enemy Golem and his evil army and try find hidden red diamonds

name: Color Slots
description: Color Slots is a speed puzzle runner. You help the rolling ball pass through the colored blocks.

name: Dracula Is Coming
description: Dracula Is Coming is a shooter that will allow you to enjoy the blood of your enemies to your heart's content. Every step can be too dangerous. Complete all levels and be careful, aspen colas are everywhere. Using your skills and your reaction, make sure that evil finally triumphs!

name: Cupid Island
description: Welcome to Cupid Island, a cute life simulator about bringing couples together and nurturing their relationships. As a Cupid, you'll discover many different couples and help their love stories. Build, customize, and expand the Island using the Love, Joy, and Passion produced by the lovely residents.

name: Railroad Corporation 2
description: Railroad Corporation 2 is a train tycoon game set at the turn of the 20th century, where you take on the mantle of a railroad magnate to start your new railroad corporation. Seize the opportunity of railroad electrification to lead the charge in the new era of trains. Strategize as you lay tracks, balance finances, deploy locomotives to ferry goods across vast landscapes, and outpace the competition.

name: Quiet Farm
description: Join forces of a cow and a small alien and embark upon a fantastic adventure! Use the rich interactive environment to solve puzzles and fight your enemies. Be resourceful - not every cow gets a chance to save the world!

name: Yui Tui
description: Yui Tui is a 2D Platform Action game where Yako, the protector of the island, has been assigned to eliminate the enemies who infiltrated the island with an intention of ruling over it.

name: Sherberia
description: With your mother gone and your father falling ill, it is up to you to cure your dad and to save the family farm. Can you tackle the every day responsibilities of running a farm? Can you save your father?

name: Fractal Evolution
description: Fractal Evolution is a 2D space exploration RPG with life simulation elements inspired by Conway's Game of Life.

name: Grey Block
description:
A story-rich, 3rd-person, cinematic, stealth puzzle/shooter that asks the player to help Theo Church escape the Green Valley Psychiatric Hospital where he has been committed while unravelling the conspiracy that landed him there.

As Theo, you’ll have to navigate the hospital’s halls as stealthily as possible while collecting as much evidence by hacking computer terminals, locating paper documents, and taking pictures of items that need to be seen to be believed. You’ll have to maneuver around security guards, and lure them out of their offices so you can access their terminal and increase your keycard access. This will allow you to push deeper into the hospital and uncover more of its secrets with the ultimate goal of reaching the highly-secure, state-of-the-art, research wing donated by Theo’s father - Church Institute of Psychological Research, but referred to amongst the patients of Green Valley as Grey Block.

What secrets will you uncover in the world of Grey Block?

name: Titanic: Fall of a Legend
description: Step aboard the RMS Titanic and experience the last moments of the most famous ocean liner to have ever been built. This unique experience provides you with the tragic events in extraordinary detail that caused the Titanic's demise.

name: Age of Valakas: Vietnam
description: 2D platformer with a gray morality, where there is no clear division into good and evil... Destroy hordes of enemies in the name of freedom, participate in a democratic crusade, fighting for the freedom and independence of Vietnam.

name: StellaGale: The Trials Of Faith
description: Fight alongside your spirit-Brother through this handcrafted 2D hack-n-slash colosseum arena, set in the steampunk Roman Empire! Be the strongest gladiator and rise to the deadliest colosseum as you seek the truth of your father’s darkest secret.

name: Caveman Hunt
description: Caveman hunt - hunt dinosaurs of the ancient world in this platformer with shooter elements. Shoot dinosaurs from primitive times to gain as much meat as possible for your tribe

name: That Role Playing
description: In a sinister days, when the darkness condensed in tricking all of us, only the Light of our Souls and clear-eyed Consciousness could serve well to save the people of The Fantasy Kingdom. Once again — a brave and skilful knight sets forth in a quest to find the legendary seven Crystals of Light...

name: Circuit: Laser Maze
description: Love logic puzzles? Challenge yourself with 55 levels of 3D connect-the-point style laser puzzles! Combining colors and angles for a truly retro gaming experience. Use your knowledge of the color wheel and keen skills of spatial perception for some passively educational fun!

name: Satama Puzzle
description: Satama Puzzle is a relaxing building and puzzle game where you will optimize the layout of a Port of Unloading. Each level will have three random variable scoring conditions, so it will be a new experience each time. Try to beat your score!

name: Neko Journey
description: Jump into this attractive and mysterious world! Save your lovely sister and the mythical creatures that inhabit it, imprisoned in the fortified castle by an elderly wizard!

name: Road Diner Simulator
description: Buy an abandoned road diner and restore it to its full glory. Renovate, upgrade and expand the diner to offer more to your customers and attract new clientele.

name: Z-Collapse
description: Inspired by the World War Z novel from Max Brooks, Z-Collapse takes you on a global zombie apocalypse. As the head of the government of your choice, make sure that your country survives! Dramatic decisions await you. How will you handle them?

name: Punched
description: Your fists speak louder then your words! In this crazy F2P beat 'em up game use all the power you can get to absolutely obliterate the competition!

name: Save the Body
description:
Save the Body is a First-person game about the Human Body.
The objective is to kill all germs in the body and unlock all infected cells and win the game

name: Galaxy Pass Station
description: The year 3020. Be the first to meet all aliens from all over the galaxy. Check alien species and their galactic papers, manage your space station, and, please, try not to unleash a galactic war... near Earth. — Your favorite Spherical Corp.

name: Cyberpunk Fighting
description: Cyberpunk Fighting - is unusual 2D quest game with fighting elements made as cyberpunk style in which you will learn about a difficult destiny of a street fighter Leroy.

name: Lobster Game
description: Lobster Game is a reaction speed game, a chain of puzzles and QTE mini-games in which you need to apply all your talents, both obvious and hidden.

name: Cosmic: A Journey Among Shadows
description: An action-adventure game set in a multilayered universe where light and shadow dictate its metaphysical rules. As a naughty little creature, embark on an interdimensional journey across space and time to rescue your sole and best friend — 𝐲𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐬𝐡𝐚𝐝𝐨𝐰

name: Time's Up in Tiny Town
description: Time's Up in Tiny Town is a fast-paced city-builder, in a pocket-sized world.

name: Bongo Quest
description: bongo quest - a bright colorful platformer for lovers of prehistoric adventures is waiting for you! Embark on an unforgettable journey through an ancient world inhabited by dangerous plants and aliens, hidden in the foliage of a primeval jungle.

name: LunaQuest
description: This is a medieval fantasy base game with enemies from the future trying to wipe out all of humanity. This is a Turned base JRPG with an Open world concept.

name: Sif and the Labyrinth
description: Sif and the Labyrinth is a pixel adventure game set in Norse mythology. Play as Sif, who embarks on a journey to uncover the reasons of disappearance of her husband Thor. Unleash Chakra Techniques and slash your way through the deserts and mountains where the darkest of entities exist.

name: Lodventure
description: Embark on a survival adventure in search of a myth called the Lod Stone in a mysterious wilderness. Discover resources and build your base. Fight with the keepers in the regions with the most suitable equipment for you. And don't forget to enjoy nature.

name: Burning Faith
description: With its great production values, beautiful art and epic fantasy quest, Burning Faith is a Tactical RPG in the classic style of Feda the Emblem of Justice and Shining Force, that will satisfy the itch of T-RPG and RPG fans alike.

name: Missile Input
description: Missile Input is an action-packed typing game where you shoot down UFOs, planes, birds and more from your missile base. Unlock special equipment and face an ever-increasing fleet of enemies. Chase the highscore or take part in an evolving storyline which is directly influenced by your actions.

name: Murderous Muses
description: Spend three nights in a cursed gallery solving the cold-case murder of Mordechai Grey, a tortured artist killed by one of six deadly muses. Hang portraits to see into the past, whilst solving puzzles and exploring ever-changing rooms. Will you be artful enough to catch the murderous muse?

name: Ahro
description: Ahro is an atmospheric side-scrolling adventure game set in an intriguing world of exploration and lore. Out now on Nintendo Switch and Steam!

name: Dungeon Death
description: Take on the role of one of the king's defenders! And go to the "Deadly Dungeon" filled with various monsters and bosses! Collect various artifacts and purchase items from a mysterious merchant!

name: The Shadows Lengthen
description: A first-person, open-world, horror indie game made only in Blender!

name: Wronged Us
description: Face the twisted, living incarnations of a town's lost hope in this open-world survival horror game, inspired by Dark Souls and Silent Hill.

name: Propagation: Paradise Hotel
description: Live an intense VR survival horror adventure with gripping storytelling, in which you will explore dark environments, make terrifying encounters and get your adrenaline pumping. Will you find your way out of the Paradise Hotel alive?

name: Neon Knights: Humanity Erased
description: Sin descripción

name: Diphtheria
description: Sin descripción

name: Sven - Gut zu Vogeln
description: This is the sixth game in the seven-title Sven Bømwøllen series.

name: Side Effect
description: Side Effect combines a game of chess with a roguelike experience. Experiment, discover combos, carve out your own path by expanding your spellbook and collecting artifacts. Lose, learn and try again.

name: QontoWars
description: A multiplayer FPS game with a sci-fi/space-like atmosphere, with a focus on versatility of gamemodes, maps, weapons and weapon/player skins

name: Lyonesse
description: Explore the magical island of Lyonesse. Lose yourself in a labyrinth of pleasure and beauty. A game inspired by Japanese Shunga and the Celtic legends of Lyonesse's Sunken Isles. Enter a hand-drawn vision of mythology, where nymphs frolic freely through a garden that bears the fruits of succulence.

name: Thrive: Heavy Lies the Crown
description: Thrive: Heavy Lies the Crown is a medieval survival city builder where the fate of your kingdom weighs heavily on the choices you make. Will you struggle to survive, or find the strength to Thrive?

name: Cosmo Player Z
description: A Sci-Fi action game for a single player bringing you to fight rebellions, level up your character and choose new skills, dress up your character in the epic space wars.

name: ZooSim
description: The humans have disappeared, and the animals are stuck in the Zoo! Rescue them in this adventure exploration comedy!

name: Starry Moon Island 2: Star Ocean MP03
description: This is a Top-Down shooting game in Space. It uses the player of the protagonist destroying the space surveillance system of the fat pig king. This DLC includes map pack 03.

name: Starry Moon Island 2: Star Ocean MP10
description: This is a Top-Down shooting game in Space. It uses the player of the protagonist destroying the space surveillance system of the fat pig king. This DLC includes map pack 10.

description: This is a Top-Down shooting game in Space. It uses the player of the protagonist destroying the space surveillance system of the fat pig king. This DLC includes map pack 01.

description: This is a Top-Down shooting game in Space. It uses the player of the protagonist destroying the space surveillance system of the fat pig king. This DLC includes map pack 06.

description: This is a Top-Down shooting game in Space. It uses the player of the protagonist destroying the space surveillance system of the fat pig king. This DLC includes map pack 07.

description: This is a Top-Down shooting game in Space. It uses the player of the protagonist destroying the space surveillance system of the fat pig king. This DLC includes map pack 02.

description: This is a Top-Down shooting game in Space. It uses the player of the protagonist destroying the space surveillance system of the fat pig king. This DLC includes map pack 05.

description: This is a Top-Down shooting game in Space. It uses the player of the protagonist destroying the space surveillance system of the fat pig king. This DLC includes map pack 08.

description: This is a Top-Down shooting game in Space. It uses the player of the protagonist destroying the space surveillance system of the fat pig king. This DLC includes map pack 04.

name: Starry Moon Island 2: Star Ocean MP09
description: This is a Top-Down shooting game in Space. It uses the player of the protagonist destroying the space surveillance system of the fat pig king. This DLC includes map pack 09.

name: Starry Moon Island 2: Perimeter MP02
description: This is a horizontal scroll shooting game in Space. It uses the player of the battle between the protagonist and the fat pig king for control of space. This DLC includes the map pack 02.

name: Starry Moon Island 2: Perimeter MP03
description: This is a horizontal scroll shooting game in Space. It uses the player of the battle between the protagonist and the fat pig king for control of space. This DLC includes the map pack 03.

name: Starry Moon Island 2: Perimeter MP05
description: This is a horizontal scroll shooting game in Space. It uses the player of the battle between the protagonist and the fat pig king for control of space. This DLC includes the map pack 05.

name: KaM Remake
description:
The KaM Remake mod is an attempt to reinvigorate the original “Knights and Merchants: The Shattered Kingdom” strategy game. Our goals are to make it work on today’s computers and operating systems, implement a fully featured online multiplayer system, as well as to fix the many bugs in the game engine. To do this we have started from scratch, writing our own code for the game engine but still relying on many original resource files. We assume that you own the original KaM game, (the installer checks for it) otherwise you should buy it – it’s available in a number of online gaming stores.
The KaM Remake executable is freeware and is built by enthusiasts. Applications used: Delphi 6, Delphi 7, FastMM4, Lazarus, OpenGL, OpenAL, zLib, PNGImage, MadExcept, libZPlay.

name: Stix: Combat Devolved
description: Stix is a multiplayer top-down arena shooter!

name: Penelope's Odyssey
description: Penelope's Odyssey is an adventure-platfomer game where you play as Penelope, an orphaned pet rat. Use your unique sense of smell to navigate the maze of a post apocalyptic city, collect memories of your owner and eventually escape to freedom.

name: Meet Cute: Cafe
description: A day that seemed awful at start turns out to be one of the best days in your life. Sometimes even a pair of dirty pants can lead to a date with a hot waitress.

name: Word of Kitchen
description: This is a word search game. Theme: kitchen. You are presented with several letters and your task is to add words from these letters.

name: SoulSide
description: Explore mysterious places and meet strange characters to unravel the dark truth. Every decision matters. Set off to lead the story to one of countless endings.

name: For the Hive
description: Survive as a tiny insect in a big harsh world. Fight your way to the top of the food chain. Build a strong colony that stands the test of time and become the ruler of the insect world.

name: Target
description: TARGET is an action-packed, multiplayer shooter based on children's Toy Tanks. Upgrade your tank to strategize your odds in the game and conquer the playing field.

name: Ride 4: Naked Japan Style
description: Buy Naked Japan Style and expand your gaming experience with 5 exclusive bikes and 10 extra events.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: VR Healesville 1913-1920 TRS19
description: Drive classic Victorian Railways steam locomotives through the famed Yarra Valley, north east of Melbourne, during the WW1 era. Comes with a selection of pre-made sessions, a pre-made multiplayer freeplay session, and a variety of Victorian Railways steam locomotives and rolling stock.

name: Ride 4: Bonus Pack 14
description: Download the Bonus Pack 14 and expand your gaming experience with 1 new exclusive bike and 5 events.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Model Trainz - New South Wales Region
description: Model Trainz: NSW Rails is an N scale model train layout set in the late 90’s early 2000’s of the New South Wales (NSW) region of Australia. Grab your favourite NSW (or VR / V/ Line) locomotive and rolling stock and drive down the tracks through the Australian countryside and towns.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: PKP/PREG/PolRegio Bdhpumn/B16mnopux Pack
description: Used for regional passenger trains in Poland, Romania, Czech Republic, and Germany this passenger coach features photorealistic fully PBR textures, and many different options.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: DB DBmu748 080
description: Built by the "VEB Waggonbau Goerlitz" factory in Germany, these versatile doubledecker cars were used on regional passenger transport by Deutsche Reichsbahn and then by Deutsche Bahn. They feature custom bogeysounds, custom interior, and more!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Mine & Field railway
description: A small module showcasing a set of content designed for representing underground mining scenes and particularly the underground transport of coal and other ores plus mining equipment and personnel. Includes mining locomotives and rolling stock, and a range of infrastructure.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: DR DBmtrue 215
description: Built by the "VEB Waggonbau Goerlitz" factory in Germany, these versatile doubledecker cars were used on regional passenger transport by Deutsche Reichsbahn and then by Deutsche Bahn. They feature custom bogeysounds, custom interior, and more!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: PKP/PREG Bdhpumn/B(16)mnopux Pack
description: Used for regional passenger trains in Poland, Romania, Czech Republic, and Germany this pack of 12 classic passenger coaches feature photorealistic fully PBR textures, and many different options.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Switch Model Railroad - TRS19
description: Switch Model Railroad is a small two baseboard route that offers plenty of switching opportunities between the yard and the industries.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Rodnye Prostory Route
description: A detailed 58km route set in the 'Commonwealth of Independent States' region of Eurasia, with 38km of single track and 9km of double track.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Centrella Sub Division
description: Located in the United States, the Centrella Sub Division runs through the mountains to the countryside, with 5 yards, 40 miles of mainline and 4 branchlines, many industries, and passenger stations. At least 50 trains uses this track as a shortcut to go east/west, with two amtrak trains per day.

name: Capelord: Bounty Hunters
description: Capelord:Bounty Hunter is a multiplayer lateral action shooter for up to 4 players, play campaign missions alone or as a team, compete against other players for loot by defeating the area boss.

name: Badlands
description: Multiplayer Post-Apocalyptic Survival Crafting Game

name: Conquer the Dungeon
description: Team up with your friends in this top down dungeon crawler! Navigate through randomly generated dungeons, slay bosses and collect their precious crystals. Keep your guard up and remember that these dungeons also have other players competing with you!

name: The Oldest Edda
description: Control the brave Runar, the toothy, one on a journey to the ends of Niflheim to fulfill a mission given by Odin: Stop a beast known as Grabak in exchange for survival. Venture into this Oldschool 2D platform game through a variety of unique and hostile environments.

name: Wormatozoa
description: A gross 2D point-and-click precision platformer about parasitic worms. Guide them through a human body in this tough-as-nails arcade slither-em-up!

name: ScreamCap
description: ScreamCap is a team of paranormal investigators live streaming their dives into the unknown to an audience of believers.

name: Animaddicts
description: Animaddicts is an arcade game.

name: Pong Temple
description: Set in a fantasy atmosphere inspired by Incan mythology, Pong Temple takes the well-known gameplays of Pong and Brick Breaker and mixes them into a procedural dungeon crawler focused on action and reflexes.

name: Skycliffs
description: Skycliffs is an action shooter roguelike dungeon crawler with fast-paced top-down platforming. Jump and dash across sky islands, fight loads of monsters, and get upgrades to survive the many dangers of your journey. Will you be strong enough to reach and defeat the keeper of this floating world?

name: The Hellbrand
description: Set in a time where gods and monsters still share the world with humans. Embark on a quest as The Hellbrand, a king who has made a deal with the devil to bring his son back to life, as long as you retrieve an ancient weapon for her in return... How far are you willing to go to save your son's life?

name: I Love Finding More Cats
description: I Love Finding Cats is back with even MORE CATS! Find all the different kinds of cute and adorable cats as you visit different locations.

name: Warden's Will
description: Warden’s Will is a fast paced movement shooter roguelite, playable solo or in up-to 3 player co-op. Choose your Warden, master unique movements and abilities, and overpower hordes of robots in intense battles. Fly, dash, smash, and turn bullet-hell into bullet-heaven!

name: Fear: Call of the village.
description: FEAR: Call of the village is a first-person horror game made in realistic 3D graphics and fearsome. In it you have to get into a mysterious village and solve various riddles, the solution of which will be hindered by various inexplicable phenomena by science.

name: SkyJumper
description: SkyJumper - Side Scroller with Runner elements. A game in which the player parries with a flying parachutist and dodges obstacles and sharp blades that fold on the move, which line up randomly and each time complicate the race.

name: Storm Swordsman
description: This is a 2D action adventure game of stealth assassination, swordsmanship and ninjutsu duel! There is no refreshing combo, and there is no Wushuang who mows the grass. hesitates will not lose, but carelessness will die! In the world of swordsmen, the victory or defeat is in the blink of an eye!

name: Tank Sudoku
description: In Tank Sudoku your goal is to finish a sudoku puzzle as fast as possible, but every cell is guarded by enemy tanks. Battle your way through each cell to finish the puzzle.
